# Send me a note {{< fa feather-pointed >}}

You can use this form to contact me about speaking engagements, collaborations, or simply to say hello.

I also love hearing if my educational materials have been helpful for you, and how they could be improved &#8212; particularly if they could be made more accessible &#9825;
